Feature selection by comparison (S4 class).

object resulting from features-method

# S4 method for features
summary(object)

show(object)

# S4 method for featuresBundle
summary(object)

# S4 method for features
view(.Object)

Arguments

object

an object
.Object

an object

Slots

corpus

Object of class "character"

Object of class "character"

Object of class "character"

corpus

Object of class "character"

stat

Object of class "data.frame"

Object of class "numeric"

Object of class "numeric"

included

Object of class "logical" whether corpus of interest is included in reference corpus
